General.Name: BHB Brauholding Bayern-Mitte AG
General.Description: BHB Brauholding Bayern-Mitte AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the brewery business in Germany. The company offers wheat beer, bottom-fermented beerspecialties, and beer mixed drinks, as well as mineral water and non-alcoholic soft drinks. It offers its products under HERRBRAU, BERNADETT BRUNNEN, GRITSCHENBRÄU, INGOBRÄU, LEITNER BREW, HERRENGIERSDORF PALACE BREWERY, and BOURGEOIS BREWERY brands. The company was founded in 1882 and is based in Ingolstadt, Germany.
